description:
With INDIGO Neo, the INDIGO Group's digital interface, you can easily find the ideal solution for all your parking needs, whether in a car park or on the street. 



INDIGO Neo allows you to find a parking space anywhere in France, Belgium, Spain, Switzerland, and Luxembourg in just two clicks. The app brings together all the services and offers available at INDIGO car parks:
  


- PARKING SUBSCRIPTION: unlimited parking   

For your regular needs, subscribe on a monthly or yearly basis to the car park of your choice, depending on your personal or professional requirements!  

- HOURLY PARKING: parking on demand   

Be recognized in all our INDIGO car parks: activate the service from your account and enter/exit INDIGO car parks without a ticket. You are billed for the time spent and payment is made automatically from your INDIGO Neo account!  

- BOOKING : for a few hours or a few days...   

Pay for your parking in advance and get a discount of up to 30% off the public rate. No ticket is required; the barrier opens automatically when you arrive. Enjoy your outings, concerts, weekends, and vacations with peace of mind!  

- ON STREET: say goodbye to parking meters!   

Park on street and pay for your parking without using a parking meter: stop or extend your parking time remotely using the app and pay the right price.  

- ELECTRIC CHARGING: get charging with INDIGO Recharge!  

Take advantage of the largest charging network in town at the best price with our tailor-made offers adapted to your needs. À la carte or with a flat rate, enjoy an optimal experience available everywhere with over 7,000 charging points in France. 

- BIKE PARKING: Cyclopark, a name you can't miss!  

Subscribe at the best rate to a closed and covered parking space, dedicated to two-wheelers and suitable for all types of bikes (cargo bikes, electric bikes, mountain bikes, etc.). You can also enjoy a changing room area with benches and lockers, as well as a workshop area with tools at your disposal to maintain your two-wheeler.  

- PROFESSIONAL PARKING: simplify your city life with INDIGO Pro!  

INDIGO Pro offers parking solutions tailored to all professional needs with exclusive services and benefits such as reduced-rate hourly parking or a single invoice that groups all parking together for easier administrative and accounting management.  

 

With INDIGO Neo, the best in parking is at your fingertips.

Know what's ahead on the road with the help from other drivers. Waze is a live map that harnesses the local knowledge of tens of millions of drivers around the world. Drivers safely and confidently reach their everyday destinations thanks to Waze map’s GPS navigation, live traffic updates, real-time safety alerts (including roadworks, accidents, crashes, police, potholes and more) and accurate ETAs.


Make your next drive more predictable and stress-free:
• Get there faster with real-time directions, accurate ETAs and automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Even if you know the way, avoid surprises on the road ahead with safety alerts for accidents, crashes, roadworks, objects on the road, potholes, speed bumps, sharp curves, bad weather, emergency vehicles, railway crossings and more
• Steer clear of tickets by knowing where police and red light and speed cameras are located
• Share what’s happening on the road with other drivers by reporting live incidents and hazards
• Stay informed of upcoming speed limit changes, and keep your speedometer in check
• Know which lane to be in with multi-lane guidance
• See toll pricing and choose to avoid tolls along your routes
• Add road passes and vignettes for HOV lanes and restricted traffic zones
• Find petrol/fuel stations and prices and EV charging stations along your route
• Locate car parks near your destination
• Use voice-guided turn-by-turn navigation from a variety of languages, local accents and your favourite celebrities
• Plan your next drive by checking ETAs by future departure or arrival times
• Use your favourite audio apps (for podcasts, music, news, audiobooks) directly within Waze
• Sync Waze to your car’s built-in display through Apple CarPlay


* Some features are not available in all countries


* Waze navigation is not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles


You can manage your in-app Waze privacy settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.

Explore and navigate the world with confidence using Google Maps. Find the best routes with live traffic data and real-time GPS navigation for driving, walking, cycling and public transport. Discover over 250 million businesses and places – from restaurants and shops to everyday essentials – with photos, reviews and helpful information.

Navigate the world, the way that you want:
• Get to where you need to go with fuel-efficient route options
• Find the best route with real-time, turn-by-turn voice and on-screen navigation
• Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Catch the bus, train and ride-share effortlessly, with real-time updates
• Find bike or scooter rentals to get around more easily

Plan trips and experiences effortlessly:
• Preview an area before you go (e.g. parking, entrances) with Street View
• Use Immersive View to experience what landmarks, parks and routes look like, and even check the weather so that you can be ready in advance
• Create custom lists of your favourite saved places and share with others
• Order delivery and takeaway, make reservations and book hotels
• Don't get lost with offline maps in an area with bad signal
• Search for local places and things to do, and decide based on user reviews and photos

Discover and explore like a local:
• Explore with confidence knowing 500 million users contribute and keep the map up to date each year
• Avoid the crowds by seeing how busy a place is before you get there
• Use Lens in Maps to see walking directions overlaid on the real world
• Filter restaurants by cuisine, hours, price, rating and more
• Ask questions about a place, from dishes to parking, and get quick answers

Some features not available in all countries or cities
Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles

Île-de-France Mobilités is here to assist you daily. Purchase a digital ticket, recharge your Navigo pass, search for routes including trains, RERs, metros, trams, buses, coaches, bicycles, Vélib', car-sharing, or car rentals. Find schedules in real-time or traffic information... Discover essential tools and information for organizing your travels in Île-de-France. Together, let's travel with ease.

Avoid queues at stations: buy your transport tickets from your iPhone!
The following tickets are available for purchase:

- Metro-Train tickets or Bus-Tram Ticket
- One Way from/to Airports (you cannot purchase this ticket if you already have a Metro-Train Ticket charged on your device)
- Navigo daily (this fare doesn’t permit you to go to airports), weekly, or monthly passes
- Special fares (Anti-pollution pass, Paris-Visit Passes etc.)
- Daily Vélib’ passes

Purchased tickets can then be (depending on the chosen purchasing path):

- Stored on the iPhone and validated directly at stations (from iPhone Xr and iOS 17.5)
- Loaded onto your Navigo pass (from an iPhone 7, with at least iOS 13. iPhone XR and XS are compatible starting from iOS 14.5)

For compatible tickets (Metro-Train and Bus-Tram Tickets, Navigo Day passes, special fares), no account is needed, and you can pay directly with Apple Pay!

You can prepare and plan your travels:

- Find nearby bus stops, train stations, and metro stations
- Search for real-time public transport routes, car-sharing, and bicycle routes
- Save upcoming trips in your phone’s calendar
- Check the next departures for your lines in real-time and all the timetable information
- View maps of public transport networks (accessible even offline)
- Follow pedestrian routes for walking segment

Stay informed and anticipate disruptions:

- Check your lines’ Twitter feed for real-time traffic updates
- Get alerts for disruptions on your favorite lines and routes
- Stay updated on the status of elevators in the stations you use

Customize your travel:

- Save your destinations (work, home, gym, etc.), stations, and stops as favorites
- Customize your profile (fast walker, with difficulties, reduced mobility, etc.)
- Select lines or stations to avoid

Prefer soft or alternative modes of transport:

- Book car-sharing and/or ride-sharing trips in partnership with leading providers
- Opt for bicycle routes for all your trips
- Rent a car or a van for a short period by choosing a Communauto car-sharing vehicle from a wide selection of stations around you and book it immediately for the duration of your choice.
--
Already using the Île-de-France Mobilités app and enjoying its services? Let us know with a 5-star rating!
Experiencing bugs or having feedback to give? Help us improve by sending your suggestions through the contact form available via the personal space.

Join Shell GO+ Rewards today and get £2.50 worth of points!*
It is now easy to save on fuel, charging, food and drinks.

To earn points and rewards, simply scan your digital card in the Shell App when you buy fuel, charge your electric vehicle (EV) at Shell Recharge and purchase selected in-store products at participating Shell service stations.*

Members can exchange their points for savings on fuel, food, drinks and partner e-gift cards. 

Plus, enjoy exclusive member benefits that makes every journey more rewarding.
Benefits:
•Save on fuel: Exchange your points for fuel discounts.
•Save on charging: Save 10p per kWh when using the Shell App to charge with Shell Recharge or for just £9.99 per month join our Shell Recharge Subscription and enjoy 30% off standard app pricing (up to 1,000 kWh/month).
•Free hot drinks: Buy 7 hot drinks and get your next hot drink free. 
•Discounts: Get 10% on our deli by Shell food range, Shell Helix engine oils and Car wash.
•Surprise freebies: including discounts on fuel and food every now and then as our way of saying thank you. 
•Partner offers: Benefit from our exclusive partner offers. 

Pay at Pump: 

Save time and enjoy the convenience of making your payment directly at the pump – ideal if you have small children or pets in the car.  
•Enter Pump Number: Confirm the pump number on the Shell app.
•Select Payment: Choose your payment method and pre-authorisation limit, and apply any fuel rewards. 
• Start Fuelling: Fill up and then drive off. It’s that simple.

Find your local Shell service station:

Discover petrol stations and EV charging points tailored just for you using the Shell App Service Station Locator. Whether you need fuel or to charge your EV, a car wash, or a quick snack, we’ve got you covered.
Explore service stations that offer Shell V-Power Diesel and Unleaded for that extra engine kick!


Begin your EV journey with Shell Recharge:

We're with you for the journey – wherever and whenever you need to recharge.
Charging is effortless and smooth with the Shell App and charge card. Use the navigator features to locate one of the many 600,000 public charging points in the large network spanning across 33 European countries. You can always find a charger that fits your criteria with the easy-to-use and smart filtering options. 
Key features:
•Plan your journey
•Save 10p per kWh when you charge with the Shell App and earn rewards with Shell GO+ Rewards or for just £9.99 per month join our Shell Recharge Subscription and enjoy 30% off standard app pricing (up to 1,000 kWh/month).
•Simple pricing and payment
•Extras, e.g personalisation and promotions to explore
 
*T&Cs apply, visit www.shell.co.uk/shellgoplustc. Participating Shell service stations and Shell Recharge branded charge points only. Shell Recharge On Street is excluded. New members will receive £2.50 worth of points when joining and opting into marketing communications.

An app and a badge for all your electric journeys

Want to travel around Luxembourg and Europe with peace of mind in your electric car? With enodrive, enjoy hassle-free electromobility: whether you have a 100% electric or hybrid vehicle, the recharging badge coupled with the application allows you to get around easily both on a daily basis and on long trips.

Bonjour RATP is the essential app for all your journeys in Île-de-France.
Plan your trips, check live traffic, purchase your tickets, and discover all mobility alternatives around you - metro, RER, bus, tram, Transilien trains, and self-service bikes.

Your routes across all networks.
Metro, RER, bus, tramway, Transilien SNCF trains, Optile… Wherever you are, Bonjour RATP finds the best journey to get you around the entire region.

Journeys tailored to you. 
Customize your search according to your preferences:
- Avoid certain lines or stations,
- Prioritize your preferred modes (metro, RER, Transilien, bus…),
- Minimize transfers or favor accessible routes.
Because every resident of Île-de-France has their own way of traveling.

Real-time traffic and personalized alerts.
Check the network status at a glance and receive real-time alerts in case of disruptions on your favorite lines across the entire Île-de-France network.

All your tickets in your pocket. 
No more monthly queues! Buy the following tickets in the app and access them directly on your iPhone or Navigo pass:
- Navigo Month
- Navigo Week
- Navigo Day
- Metro-Train-RER tickets
- Bus-Tram tickets
- Paris Region-Airports tickets
- Special tickets (Music Festival, Anti-pollution pass...)
- Paris Visite pass

Always on time.
Check real-time schedules for upcoming departures on all your lines. Never miss your bus, metro, or RER again. An incident on your lines? Thanks to alerts, you’ll be immediately informed and the app will suggest an alternative.

Speak and go (Beta)
Just say where you want to go, and Bonjour RATP takes care of the rest!
Voice search makes your journeys even easier.

Bike sharing
Want to ride? Find a bike in seconds. Bonjour RATP shows availability of Vélib’, Lime, and Dott.

Why choose Bonjour RATP?
- Complete coverage across all Île-de-France
- Customizable routes based on your preferences and habits
- Real-time traffic and alerts
- All tickets and passes directly in the app
- All self-service bikes available
- Smooth, clear, and intuitive interface

For more information about our services, feel free to contact us by email at clients@bonjour-ratp.fr

developer: Operateur de Transport de Wallonie SA
description:
Getting around on public transport in Belgium made easy with the TEC App!

The TEC app will provide you with all the information you need for a smooth journey on the TEC network as well as the STIB, De Lijn and SNCB networks.

Quickly find the best route by bus, tram, metro and train and follow the progress of your journey step by step with real time data.

Buy your TEC and SNCB tickets using the TEC app for immediate travel on both networks.

Check the details and timetable for TEC lines and stops to find out where the next bus is.

Easily locate TEC points of sale (SELFs, POINT TECs and ESPACE TECs) in your local area, as well as the services they offer.

Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transport rides!

Dailymail - "This travel app is a godsend for anyone using public transport – with live updates to bus schedules, as well as a great route-planner for cities across the UK."

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway/underground /tube, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use bikes, ride-sharing like Uber, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Moovit guides you from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and live arrival times with ease so you can plan your trip with confidence. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike or a combination of them. 
This is why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year 2017 by the App Store!

Moovit guides more than 865 million users in over 3200 cities throughout the world.

► Journey Planner that combines you all transport options and gives you the best route with live arrivals.

► Live Directions: Get step-by-step directions with live guidance as you travel: know exactly how long you need to walk to your station, how long you’re waiting, view the arrival time of your line and how many stops are left. 

► Real time arrivals. View real-time arrival updates, which are taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains.

► Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction and more...

► Users reports. Moovit’s users report issues found with stations, line service, and timetables so that we can inform all nearby riders about what’s going on in their area.

► Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your favorite lines in case your bus or train time is impacted!

► Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus. 
Bike docking stations are updated in real-time.

► Maps view. View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when you’re offline, or underground on the subway. 

Ride with Moovit in all major cities:

UK:
• London
• Manchester
• Birmingham
• Leeds
• Edinburgh
• Glasgow
• Liverpool
• Sheffield

Ireland:
• Dublin and all of the Republic of Ireland. 

Moovit supports all major transit:

UK:
• TFL - Bus, Tube, DLR, Overground, Ferry (River Bus), Tfl Rail, Tram, Coach
• National Express
• National Rail
• Arriva
• First
• Stagecoach and more...

Ireland:
• Bus Eireann
• Dublin Bus
• Irish Rail
• Luas
• Kenneally’s Bus Service and more…

Bike sharing provided by:
• Santander Cycles in London
• BelfastBikes in Belfast
• Bike in Bath
• Nextbike in Glasgow

India:
•Delhi: Delhi Metro (DMRC), Delhi Buses (DTC), Northern Railways (NR)
•Mumbai: Mumbai Metro (M.M.R.D.A), all buses: BEST, NMMT, KDMT, VVMT, MBMT, KMT, TMT, Ferries and more
•Bangalore: Namma Metro, B.M.T.C (buses and metro feeder routes), South Western Railways
•Chennai: Chennai Metro Rail, all buses - Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTA)
•Ahmedabad: A.M.T.S, Bus Rapid Transport System (BRTS), V.T.C.O.S 
•Pune: Indian Railways, Pune Local Central Railways, Pune Mahanagar Parivahan Mahaman.

Singapore:
• MRT, LRT, bus, tram, cable car & shuttle buses. Service provided by:
• SBS
• SMRT
• Tower Transit
• Go-Ahead Singapore

You ride, we guide!

Feel free to contact us:

https://moovitapp.zendesk.com/hc/requests/new
moovit@Facebook, Twitter

Terms of Use
https://moovitapp.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-service-en

Transit is your real-time urban travel companion. Open the app to instantly see accurate next departure times, check and track buses, and trains near you on the map, and see upcoming transit schedules. Use the trip planner to quickly compare trips, including bus, ferry, bike, metro or rail, and subway options. Get alerted about service disruptions and delays for your favorite lines, and save frequently used locations for trip directions in a tap. 

HERE’S WHAT THEY’RE SAYING
"Gives you the best route to where you want to go" - New York Times
“You won't realize how much time you can save planning until you use this app” - LA Times
“Killer app” - Wall Street Journal
"MBTA has a favorite transit app — and it's called Transit" - Boston Globe
“A one-stop-shop” - Washington Post

AND HERE’S THE WORD FROM PUBLIC TRANSIT RIDERS
“Your app was the deciding factor in selling my car.”
“Blows Google Maps out of the water.”
“The head of our local transit agency recommended this app over the one her agency created.”

5 GREAT THINGS ABOUT TRANSIT:

1) THE BEST REAL-TIME DATA
Using the best transit agency data sources, and our fancy ETA prediction engine, we give you the most accurate real-time info possible for all transit modes -  including buses, subways, trains, streetcars, metros, ferries, ridehail and more. Prefer to travel on two wheels? With GPS, you can see live bikeshare and scooter locations right on the map. 

2) TRAVEL OFFLINE
Bus schedules, stop locations, subway maps and even our trip planner are available offline.

3) POWERFUL TRIP PLANNING
See fast and easy trips combining buses, subways and trains – the app even suggests routes that combine multiple options in one trip like bus + bike or scooter + metro. You’ll find great trip plans that you never even considered! Don’t like to walk a lot or use a certain mode or transit agency? Personalize your travel in the settings.  

4) GO: OUR STEP-BY-STEP NAVIGATOR*
Receive departure alarms to catch your bus or train, and get alerted when it’s time to get off or transfer. When using GO, you’ll also crowdsource more accurate info and real-time ETAs for other passengers– and rack up points and thank yous for being the most helpful rider on your line.  

5) USER REPORTS
See what other riders have to say! With millions of users contributing, you’ll get helpful info on crowding levels, on-time performance, the closest subway exits, and more.

*continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

900+ CITIES INCLUDING:
London, Manchester, Birmingham, Leeds, Glasgow, Liverpool, Edinburgh, Bristol, Nottingham, Newcastle upon Tyne, Sheffield, Brighton, Southampton, Leicester, Reading, Belfast, Portsmouth, Bournemouth, Blackpool, Milton Keynes, Sunderland, Hull, York, Ipswich, Guildford, Chichester, Aylesbury, Warrington, Crawley, Devon, Essex, Norfolk, Keighley, Penzance, Falmouth, Doncaster, Chippenham, Carlisle, Harrogate, Honley, Gloucester

AND ALSO CITIES ACROSS THE WORLD:
Paris, Barcelona, Berlin, Brussels, Bristol, Calgary, Dubai, Dublin, Chicago, Edinburgh, Edmonton, Los Angeles, Melbourne, Milan, Montreal, New York City, Madrid, Auckland, Quebec City, Rome, Sydney, Toronto, Vancouver, Victoria, Washington D.C.

1000+ PUBLIC TRANSPORT AUTHORITIES INCLUDING:

TfL (Transport for London), Arriva, TfGM, First Group, Stagecoach, Lothian Buses, Translink,  Go North East, Nexus, Transdev, Metrolink, SPT, Diamond Bus,NET,Bee,South West England,South East England,East Anglia, South Yorkshire Future Trams, Midland Bluebird,Manchester Rail,Newcastle Upon Tyne,Megabus,Nexus (Tyne & Wear Metro),TfGM, National Express,Megabus, Go North West, Stagecoach,RATP, Glasgow Subway,First, Edinburgh Trams, Dublin Bus, Dublin Luas, DART, Arriva, Merseyrail, Heathrow Express, Thames Valley

SEE ALL SUPPORTED CITIES & COUNTRIES: TRANSITAPP.COM/REGION

**Questions or feedback? Browse our help pages: help.transitapp.com, email us: info@transitapp.com, or find us on X: @transitapp**

China's first English map for overseas users has officially launched!
The Choice of 800 Million Navigation Users. 
Over 200 countries and territories mapped and hundreds of millions of places on the map. 
Exploring China with AMAP as your guide!

-3D lane-level views & traffic light countdown
-Get real-time traffic updates & ETAs
-Detail junction views, never miss a turn 
-See real time transit info and route options

Instantly compare your travel options in real-time across all transport modes globally, with live departures and bus locations!

Easily navigate your area with turn-by-turn directions for all your public transport, walking, cycling and scooter trips. 

THOUSANDS OF 5 STAR REVIEWS

* "Life changing. This app really changes the way you travel."
* "The only true five star app."
* "BEST TRANSPORT APP EVER."
* "It's become a weird and possibly sad fact of my life that waiting and receiving Citymapper updates have overtaken Christmases and birthdays on the anticipation and excitometer."

FIND THE BEST ROUTE ► Simple trip planning combining all transport modes: bus, tube, train, tram, ferry, cabs, rideshare, carshare, bike hire, e-scooters and walking. Discover routes you never knew existed

HIT THE GO BUTTON FOR STEP-BY-STEP DIRECTIONS ► Turn-by-turn navigation for all your transport, walking, personal cycling, bike shares and scooter trips. Choose between 3 different map views, see the charge levels of e-bikes around you, we even help you avoid no-parking zones. We take care of the logistical thinking so you are free to enjoy the ride

BEAT THE RUSH HOUR CROWD ► Live wait times and ETA so you'll never miss a bus, train or tram again. Follow your bus / train as it's approaching on a real-time map, see the best carriage to board, get alerted when it's time to get off, and get in and out from the best exit at any underground / train station 

PERSONALISE YOUR APP ► Save Home, Work and your go-to stops or stations for lightning fast trip planning. Subscribe to your favourite tube, train, bus or tram line for automatic disruption, delay, and status alerts

GET SOCIAL ► Share your live trip: let friends follow your live trip to know when you'll arrive. Share any location or address: one tap for others to get directions

TRAVEL OFFLINE ► Access offline the official TfL underground map and many other local network maps

EXPERIENCE ONE-STOP-SHOP MOBILITY ► Compare cab fares, hail a ride, grab the closest carshare, hop on a shared bike all from within the app. Our partners include: Uber, Gett, Zipcar, Ola, Getaround, FREENOW, LIME, Santander Cycles, Forest, Beryl, Anywheel

COVERAGE ► London and the South East | Birmingham and the Midlands | Manchester | Liverpool | Yorkshire | Edinburgh | Dublin | Paris | New York | Singapore | Taiwan | Hong Kong | Los Angeles | Barcelona | Berlin | Rome | Madrid | Hamburg | Milan | Stockholm | Chicago | Toronto | Sydney + many more in the UK worldwide!

PUBLIC TRANSPORT AGENCIES ► We use open data from public transport agencies including:

UK WIDE | National Rail, Arriva, Stagecoach, First bus
LONDON | TfL (Transport for London), Underground, Overground, Docklands Light Railway (DLR), Tramlink 
MANCHESTER | TfGM (Transport for Greater Manchester), Manchester Metrolink 
LIVERPOOL | Merseytravel, Merseyrail
YORKSHIRE | WYCA (West Yorkshire Combined Authority), SYPTE (South Yorkshire Public Transport Executive), Sheffield Supertram
WEST MIDLANDS | TfWM (Transport for West Midlands), West Midlands Railway, Midland Metro, National Express West Midlands, National Express Coventry, Travel Telford, Worcestershire County Council, Diamond Bus
NOTTINGHAM | NCT, NET
EDINBURGH | TfE, Lothian Bus, Edinburgh Tram
GLASGOW | SPT
BRISTOL | Travelwest, MetroBus, Bristol Ferries
CARDIFF | Transport for Wales, Cardiff Bus
NEWCASTLE | NEXUS, Tyne and Wear Metro
BRIGHTON | Brighton & Hove Buses
DUBLIN | TFI, NTA, Bus Éireann, Dublin Bus, Iarnród Éireann (Irish Rail)
HONG KONG | MTR, HK Tramways, Light Rail, Kowloon Motor Bus, Citybus, First Bus, First Ferry, Star Ferry, Discovery Bay Ferry & Bus, Park Island Ferry & Bus, Green Mini Bus
SINGAPORE | LTA, SMRT, SBS

KEEP IN TOUCH ► Questions, feedback or something we have missed in your city? Email us at support@citymapper.com

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Citymapper
Visit our website: http://citymapper.com

• You’re looking for the best-rated charging station nearby? 
• You’re preparing for a long trip by electric vehicle for the holidays? 
• You want to locate the best rapid charging stations along your route?
• You’re looking for free charging stations in the surrounding area?

Chargemap is the benchmark app that is already the loyal companion of over 3 million EV and PHEV drivers for stress-free travelling and charging.

Chargemap’s map lists over 1 million charge points and covers most European charging networks. It makes it so easy to locate charging stations in France, Germany, the Netherlands, Belgium, Switzerland, Italy, Spain, Austria, Britain, Norway and many other countries across Europe.
You can also find all the key information you need to locate the right charging station for your needs: connector types, power ratings, time slots, means of access, scores and comments from the community etc.

Why opt for the Chargemap app?

FIND THE BEST CHARGING STATIONS…
The powerful filters help you locate the charging stations that meet your requirements: free charging points, best scores, fast charging stations, favourite networks, on motorways only etc.

Whatever EV you drive - Tesla Model 3, Tesla Model S, Tesla Model X, Tesla Model Y, Renault Zoe, Renault Megane E-Tech Electric, Peugeot e-208, Peugeot e-2008, MG 4, Volkswagen ID.3, Volkswagen ID.4, Volkswagen ID.5, BMW i3, BMW i4, BMW iX, Nissan Leaf, Dacia Spring, Fiat 500 e, Kia e-Niro, Kia EV6, Skoda Enyak, Citroën ë-C4, Hyundai Kona Electric, Audi Q4 e-tron, Porsche Taycan or any other electric car, Chargemap knows how to pick out the right charging stations so you can top up your electric vehicle hassle-free.


...ON EVERY CHARGING NETWORK
• Charge Your Car
• Tesla Superchargers
• Tesla Destination Charging
• New Motion (Shell recharge)
• Source London
• Pod Point
• EVBox
• Ionity
• Allego
• Fastned
• Lastmile Solutions
• Innogy
• Enbw
• Enel X
• Total Energies
...and over 1800 other networks!


PLAN YOUR ROUTES
No more stress about charging! The Chargemap route planner helps you find the ideal route that dovetails your particular EV and personal preferences. You can customise it as you wish and simply enjoy the ride!


NEVER TRAVEL ALONE
Join the largest community of EV drivers who help each other out every day by logging in new charging stations, adding information and photos and posting comments on each charging station.

You can rate your charging session and access the scores attributed by other users for each charging station according to different criteria: reliability of the equipment, value for money, location and safety. You can also report any malfunctions or practical information to the community in no time.


MANAGE YOUR CHARGING
With the Chargemap Pass charging card, top up at over 800,000 compatible charging points in Europe. You can locate them at a glance, consult charging rates and monitor your expenditure in a dedicated tab.


FIND YOUR TRAVELLING COMPANION ON APPLE CARPLAY
You can now fully profit from Chargemap’s features from the dashboard of your electric car. You can display the charge points in the surrounding area, find your favourite charging stations and the routes you have saved and make your way to the next charging station via your favourite GPS app.
 

A TEAM THAT CARES
Chargemap is also a dream team that gives their all to enhance the app every day with the help of your invaluable feedback. Any questions, suggestions, rave reviews? Get in touch at hello@chargemap.com!

Travel confidently around London with Transport for London's official app, built around our iconic live Tube map. Try switching to step-free mode and watch the map adjust to show only accessible stations, ensuring your journeys are as smooth as possible. With a clear, user-friendly design, TfL Go is easy for everyone to use.

Find the Best Route
We'll suggest multiple ways to get to your destination, whether by Tube, London Overground, Elizabeth line, DLR, Tram, National Rail, IFS Cloud Cable Car, or even cycling and walking. You choose the route that suits you best.

Check Before You Travel
Get live arrival times for Buses, Tube, London Overground, Elizabeth Line, DLR, Tram, and National Rail. Check the live status of all TfL lines and stations directly on the map, or view a summary of current disruptions in the "Status" section.

Freedom to Explore
Find travel options tailored to your needs, including step-free journeys and routes avoiding stairs or escalators. Journey plans automatically adapt to the accessibility status of stations, helping you avoid disruptions. TfL Go also supports VoiceOver and Dynamic Type, making it more accessible for everyone.

Manage Your Payments
Create an account or log in to manage your payments for travel across London. Top up pay as you go credit or purchase Travelcards for your Oyster card, and view your journey history for both Oyster and contactless cards registered to your account.

Note: Oyster and contactless accounts can only be accessed within UK/Europe.

Understand Station Facilities
Check how busy a station is right now, or see if it has toilets or Wi-Fi access. Find detailed information about step-free access and interchanges including platform gap width, step height and boarding methods available.

What People Are Saying:
"...a surprisingly phenomenal app for commuters travelling via public transport in London!"
"One of the finest transport apps there is, well thought out, well designed and well executed."
"The most accurate app in London for bus times"
"Fantastic app if only just to have a live Tube map / bus tracker in your pocket at all times!"
"TfL Go is your number one stop for live tube and bus arrivals"

Get in Touch
Any questions, feedback or something we've missed? Email us at tflappfeedback@tfl.gov.uk

developer: GOLDLAB APPLICATIONS YAZILIM VE BILISIM ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Navigation-Radar: Safe and Easy Travel with Advanced Maps

With Navigation-Radar, every journey becomes less stressful and more rewarding. Instead of worrying about wrong turns or poor signals, you enjoy confidence, safety, and freedom. The combination of map, navigation, and gps tools gives you control of your travel experience so you can focus on what matters most—getting there comfortably and on time.

Travel Smarter, Save Time

Avoid fines and stressful surprises with real-time alerts. The gps tracker, tracking devices, and hud display keep you informed of speed limits, radar zones, and hazards. This means fewer distractions, safer driving, and peace of mind on every route.

Stay Connected Anywhere

Don’t let a weak signal stop your adventure. With offline map support, you always have access to your planned route. Combined with organic map design, your navigation feels natural and reliable. The gps map camera helps you capture and review your journeys so you can always retrace your steps.

Maximize Every Journey

Find fuel, food, or hotels instantly with smart search. Save your favorite places, bookmark routes, and review your travel history through the gps tracker. Supported by tracking devices, hud integration, and layered organic map views, you travel with confidence knowing everything you need is at your fingertips.

Your Benefit

Navigation-Radar isn’t just about maps—it’s about giving you more freedom, safety, and efficiency. You save time, reduce stress, and enjoy complete control of your travels. With tools like the gps map camera, detailed maps, and precise navigation, your journeys become easier, smoother, and more enjoyable.

Download Navigation-Radar today and take control of your travel. Get there faster, safer, and smarter.

Your subscription automatically renews, ensuring you never miss a moment of enhanced app usage. However, you have the flexibility to manage your subscription settings and turn off auto-renewal at any time from your account preferences.

Privacy Policy: https://www.goldlabtechnology.com/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.goldlabtechnology.com/end-user-license-agreement/

The Bip&Go app accompanies you in your daily mobility and gives more power to your Bip&Go subscription !


The Bip&Go app makes it easier for you to get around : 
track your toll road’s consumptions, book a parking space, find service stations and Motorway Service Areas, plan your itinerary, etc.



With the Bip&Go application, we provide you with more services to make your daily life easier, whether you want to track your toll road’s consumption, download and print your invoices, plan your next holiday, find and/or book a parking space or pinpoint the cheapest service station around you.



Convenient and fast, enter or leave the car park with a simple push on a button from your app. The amount corresponding to the duration of your parking is then added to your monthly Bip&Go bill.



FOR SUBSCRIBERS: ACCESS TO YOUR BIP&GO CUSTOMER ACCOUNT

- Your Bip&Go account is available at any time from your application to manage your tag and electronic toll subscription information or edit your personal information.
- Track your consumptions, view, download and print your invoices.
- Contact Bip&Go customer service in a few clicks from the Bip&Go application.



USEFUL MOBILITY SERVICES FOR YOUR EVERYDAY JOURNEYS

The Bip&Go app also accompanies you off the motorways with exclusive services:

- Liber-T parking: easily find a Liber-T compatible car park around you or at your destination.
- Parking space reservation: since 2021: via our partner Zenpark, reserve a parking space in more than 200 cities in France and Belgium, up to 60% cheaper, using the Bip&Go app.
- EV charging: find nearby charging stations in France and Europe, as well as all the necessary information (location, number of stations, type of connectors, charging cost, power, etc.)
- Fuel: view all the stations near your location as well as the prices charged and information on the station and the services available.
- Car wash: find more than 3500 car wash stations throughout France.


 YOUR PERSONALISED JOURNEYS FOR A CONTROLLED BUDGET


The Bip&Go application accompanies you on all your journeys and helps you prepare your trips:

- Personalized itinerary: plan your journey for all your trips and get detailed costs in tolls and fuel.
- Use your favourite app to get navigation instructions.
- Customise the information related to your vehicle to get even more accurate costs (vehicle type, fuel used...).



MORE SOON...

We are willing to be by your side during your journeys by providing you with useful and essential services to make your trips smoother. Very soon, new services will be added to the application to improve your mobility and your journeys.



Do you have suggestions for improving the application? We are listening to you: appli@bipandgo.com

- If you have a question or need help with the application, please consult the Q&A section or contact our support service from the application menu > contact, or via the following form or by telephone on + (33)9 708 08 765 (no surcharge) from Monday to Friday from 8am to 8pm and on Saturdays from 8am to 1pm (excluding  french public holidays).



Not yet a Bip&Go customer ? Discover our electronic toll payment subscription plans on https://www.bipandgo.com/en/abonnement-telepeage-particuliers/





Don't miss out on any news about Bip&Go and the development of the application on :

- Bip&Go - Télépéage | Facebook
- Bip&Go (@bipandgo) / Twitter

Say hi to your co-driver.

You’re searching for a top-notch EV charging experience? Here you are: Download the IONITY App to access Europe’s leading High-Power Charging (HPC) network available across 24 countries – open to EVs from all manufacturers. Our network delivers maximum charging speeds of up to 400 kW, enabling you to charge 300 kilometres of range in 15 minutes. Faster charging sessions — more time for you. 

Discover the highlights of the IONITY App

Navigation
•	Search and find the nearest or a specific IONITY Station — the availability of all charging points is displayed in real-time.
•	Use the IONITY Route Planner to plan your journey ahead and import your daily or upcoming routes to your favourite navigation app with ease. 

Charging
•	Conveniently start and end your charging session directly within the IONITY App.
•	Track your charging progress in real-time and receive a push notification when you’re at 80% to go back on the road.
•	Optional: Use our app to scan the QR code on the charger to start the session. 

Payment
•	Safely store your account and payment details within the app to conveniently pay for your charging sessions.
•	Receive monthly invoices for your personal or professional use to keep an eye on your spendings.
•	Have a closer look at your past IONITY charging sessions and explore useful information like session duration, kWh charged and charging curves.

Find the right IONITY Subscription for you

Discover our subscriptions within the app: Choose the one that matches your lifestyle, driving habits, and charging needs by opting for IONITY Power or Motion. Sign up now and charge your electric vehicle at very attractive price per kWh. Prices vary by country. 

IONITY Power
Power your EV and charge for less: Our IONITY Power subscription is the right choice for most EV drivers. You save money after only two charging sessions per month: Benefit from the cheapest charging prices per kWh and continue your journey fast.

IONITY Motion
Keep yourself in motion: IONITY Motion is the ideal subscription for drivers that only occasionally use their electric vehicle and want to benefit from a cheaper charging price per kWh by using the IONITY App.

Your benefits with IONITY Power and IONITY Motion:
•	A significantly lower charging price per kWh
•	No seasonal or peak changes of kWh prices
•	Switch your current subscription anytime 
•	Cancel subscription anytime to next billing date
•	Subscribe and pay via the IONITY App

Charging for registered users without IONITY Power or Motion subscription:

IONITY Go
Ready. Set. Go! Sign up within the IONITY App and automatically benefit from a slightly lower charging price per kWh. No subscription and no monthly fees. This is IONITY Go. Upgrade to our subscriptions to save even more.

About IONITY
IONITY builds and operates Europe’s largest ultra-fast charging network. With a High-Power Charging (HPC) capacity of up to 400 kW, it enables maximum charging speeds. IONITY exclusively uses renewable energy, ensuring emission-free and carbon-neutral driving. Currently, the IONITY network includes over 700 charging stations and more than 4,800 HPC charging points across 24 European countries.

IONITY was founded in 2017 and is a joint venture between the car manufacturers BMW Group, Ford Motor Company, Hyundai Motor Group, Kia, Mercedes-Benz AG and Volkswagen Group with Audi and Porsche as well as BlackRock's Climate Infrastructure Platform as a financial investor. The company is headquartered in Munich, Germany, and has additional offices in Dortmund, Germany, the French metropolis Paris, and outside the Norwegian capital Oslo. Further information at www.ionity.eu.

GPS & Maps Navigator is your ultimate GPS assistant designed for fast, accurate, and smart travel. Whether you're commuting daily, planning a road trip, or exploring new places, Route master brings all your travel tools together in one place.

Key Features:

 Smart Route Planner: Enter your source and destination to get the most optimized routes instantly with advanced maps navigation support.

 Nearby Places: Discover restaurants, gas stations, ATMs, and more around you using smart maps navigator tools.

 Current Location Finder: Quickly find  your current position using precise GPS location.

 Currency Converter: Convert global currencies while using the app during your trips.

 Language Translator: Communicate with ease while traveling, no matter the language.

 Wi-Fi Tools: Find nearby Wi-Fi hotspots and manage saved passwords using the built-in network tools and location services.

Ideal for travelers, delivery drivers, road trippers, or anyone needing a reliable GPS-based app or intuitive maps navigator. Route Master gives you smooth navigation, real-time tracking, and helpful tools to make every journey easier.

 Download GPS & Maps Navigator now and make your next trip smarter with GPS and maps navigation!

Discover millions of outdoor trails around the world. Choose between hiking, running, bike, MTB, kayak, ski or up to 80 different types of activities.

Record your own routes on a map, add waypoints, take pictures along the itinerary and upload them to your Wikiloc account from your phone.

Enjoy free offline topographic maps from all over the world for you to use without coverage or data. Great when you're out in the mountains or traveling without Internet connection.

Want to take your outdoor experiences even further? With Wikiloc Premium:

- Turn your mobile into a GPS navigator. Your smartphone will guide you with a heading indicator and sound alerts to warn you if you go off-track during navigation.
- Route Planner: Choose the places you want to pass through and Wikiloc will create a route prioritizing the most popular stretches of trails from other community members.
- 3D Maps: Without leaving home, discover the terrain relief, evaluate elevation changes, and take a look at the panoramic views that await you along the way.
- Live Tracking. Share your position in real time with your family & friends while doing the route.
- Send to your GPS: Download trails from Wikiloc directly to your Garmin, Apple Watch, Suunto or COROS. Feature available for compatible devices.
- Search by Passing Area: Find trails passing through your chosen specific areas.
- Weather forecast for a perfect outdoor activity.
- Advanced search filters.

By purchasing Wikiloc Premium you’ll be contributing in helping us out to maintain Wikiloc’s infrastructure. 
Furthermore, you’ll also contribute protecting the earth, as 1% of your purchase will directly go to 1% for the Planet, a global network of businesses, nonprofits, and individuals working together for a healthy planet.

Wikiloc Premium is available with a quarterly or annual subscription. 

Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase or at the end of the trial period if applicable. Wikiloc Premium subscriptions automatically renew. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period unless you decide to cancel your subscription renewal at least 24 hours before the renewal date.

You can manage your subscription or turn off auto-renewal by going to your user Account Settings after the purchase. For your convenience, we also provide links to manage your subscription from your Wikiloc Profile > Settings, that you can access from both web or app.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Wikiloc for Apple Watch uses HealthKit to save your Wikiloc activities into the Health app and to read the heart rate and active energy data. Most popular Wikiloc activities have an equivalent Apple workout and will be saved into the Health app.

Terms of use: https://www.wikiloc.com/wikiloc/terms_en.html?v6.0
Privacy policy: https://www.wikiloc.com/wikiloc/privacy.html?v4.1

Join us at Wikiloc.com, the community where millions of nature, travel and sports lovers share their adventures, from the most popular excursion to the most remote expedition on the planet.

Unique in Luxembourg

Bestwash by Petro-center

The name says it all!

The cashless and contactless solution for a clean car!

The Bestwash App is your mobile ticket for a sparkling clean car. Anytime! Simply confirm your car wash directly in the app at one of our numerous car washes and choose between a single wash, a block of 10+1 or the monthly cancellable BestWash Flatrate.
Save time and money with our BESTWASH subscription! With us, you pay a fixed monthly amount and can have your car washed several times a month. 

Our professional team ensures that your car always looks clean with a thorough pre-wash (depending on location). Our car wash provides a gentle and effective cleaning of your vehicle. We only use high quality detergents and the latest technology to remove even the most stubborn dirt.
Simply download the app and find out about our attractive flat rate car wash offers! Subscriptions without any obligations and can be cancelled monthly.

It's that easy:
Download the app, register and wash

Petro-Center S.A. is a Luxembourg family business based in Leudelange, which is active in the petrol station business as well as in the mineral oil industry. It operates and supplies a large network of petrol stations in Luxembourg and offers fuels, car washes and other services for motorists.

The company was founded in 2000 and has since played a significant role in the petrol station business in Luxembourg.

Petro-Center S.A. petrol stations offer various types of fuels, including petrol, diesel and LPG. They also have car washes (Bestwash) and convenience stores (One-Stop) where customers can buy food, drinks, snacks and other items. Furthermore, in the food service area, 60 cooks are at the service of customers. Be it sandwiches, salads, pizza, pasta, sushi, daily menu with homemade dessert, treats, take-away dishes or snacks for those in a hurry, there is something for every customer and every purse. A dining area furnished with good taste invites you to linger in many of our ONE-STOP ESSO petrol stations. Cooking is done exclusively in the in-house kitchen. Why not stop off at one of our ONESTOP shops after work to buy fresh fruit and vegetables or take advantage of a variety of low-price supermarket offers.

The two flower shops Floraldesign in the Esso petrol stations Senningerberg and Leudelange specialise in the design and sale of flower arrangements and other floral products and accessories. The company offers a wide range of services, including bouquet delivery, wedding decorations and event floristry.

The company emphasises customer service and strives to provide its customers with a pleasant and comfortable experience. It has a team of qualified and friendly staff who are happy to help customers when needed.
Overall, Petro-Center S.A. is a leader in the petrol station business in Luxembourg, focusing on customer service, environmental protection and sustainability.

Ready for better EV charging?

This is Octopus Electroverse, the UK & Europe’s largest EV charging network.
It will change how you charge on the go.

—

Access over 1,000,000 chargers with the all-powerful and award-winning Electroverse app and Electrocard. The Electrocard (RFID) is free to order & you can do this through the Electroverse app whenever you like. 

One app. One card. One place for your charging needs.
This is public EV charging made simple.

‘But I’m not an Octopus customer!’ we hear you cry - well, good news, you don’t need to be with Octopus Energy to use Electroverse - it’s open to all!

What’s more, paywalls and hidden fees aren’t our thing - we’re more ‘discounts and inclusivity’. So, once you’ve signed up, you’ll have access to every feature immediately. 

You’ll also only ever get clear and transparent pricing from us. We never mark up charging rates, directly passing through the rate we receive from the relevant network. This also means we’re able to wrangle some discounted deals, so you can start saving on your favourite charging networks.

We’ll see you in the Electroverse soon.

——

App features include:

- Plunge Pricing discounts = On top of our standard discounts, we’ve rolled out Plunge Pricing: discounts when energy prices drop. Green energy = greener discounts.
- Electroverse map toggle = Switches map visibility between all chargers and those compatible with Electroverse. This means you have all the information when selecting a charger.
- Map filters = Search and find charging stations via charging speeds, socket types and preferred networks.
- Detailed Charger Information = Shows live charger availability, a renewable energy icon to help you charge with 100% green energy, and important location details (such as charging costs and other parking restrictions).
- In-app charging = Charge your vehicle via the app! Simply plug in and tap 'start charge' on your phone.
- Route planner = Energise your drive with plotted charging stops along any route! Makes driving long distances a piece of cake.
- Pay, your way = Debit card, Apple Pay, & more. It’s all your choice.

——

Winners of:

- Best EV Charging App (2025) -  E-mobility Awards
- Mobile Innovation of the Year (2024) - National Technology Awards
- Best EV charging app (2023) - AutoExpress Awards
- EV charging and app development (2022) - E-mobility Awards

Charge Europe is the new generation mobile application dedicated to TotalEnergies' public Charge Points in Europe.

With the help of TotalEnergies Charge Europe app, you can :
- Find real-time available charge points directly on the map or through a search box, filtered by connector type and power.
- Scan the QR Code on any charge point and start a ""Pay As You Go"" charge.
- Monitor your ongoing charging session in real-time within the app, through the lock screen widget or on your Apple Watch, stop it with a single click.
- Enable push notifications to be warned when charge stops.
- Create an account and save your mean of payment, get easy access to your charging history (including charging curves and fast vs. regular charging split) and invoices, and set as favorite your preferred charge points for future easy access.
- Use Touch / Face ID to connect to the app.
- Subscribe to one of our offers available in United Kingdom, France and Spain to activate booking of any available charge point, receive your personal RFID badge to simplify charge launch and payment, and even get discounts on kWh price with our Master subscription! As a subscriber, you can launch several bookings simultaneously If needed.
- With the help of Apple CarPlay, select a charge point directly on the screen of your car, book it, and use your preferred navigation app to reach it.
- Several electric vehicles in the same household? Several charges can be launched simultaneously, either by using one badge per vehicle and/or through PAYGO feature.

Stay in touch with friends and family. Enjoy the security and connectivity of global messaging with the Garmin Messenger™ app. Pair with your compatible inReach® satellite communicator for fast, easy direct messaging and interactive SOS that’s not limited to cellphone coverage areas (active satellite subscription required). The app supports group messaging as well as photo and voice messaging when paired with a compatible Garmin device (1). Automatic switching between internet, cellular, and satellite networks gives you the best connectivity and efficiency for all your messaging. When you have connectivity, the app will work seamlessly even if your inReach device is turned off. Invite your friends and family to download the app to stay connected and keep the conversation going on and off the trail. With the use of the LiveTrack™ feature, loved ones can follow your location in real time (2) and see data such as distance, time and elevation. 

(1) See compatible devices at garmin.com/p/893837#devices
(2) When used with your compatible smartphone and the Garmin Earthmate® app or when used with your compatible inReach® technology-enabled Garmin device.

Note: Some jurisdictions regulate or prohibit the use of satellite communication devices. It is the responsibility of the user to know and follow all applicable laws in the jurisdictions where the device is intended to be used.

Good to have you here! Our iOS app brings tenants and landlords together in an uncomplicated way. Flatshares, 1 room flats, flats and coliving - you will find attractive offers for all types of property and, thanks to the high reach of WG-Gesucht.de, you are guaranteed to find the right tenant.

FOR PEOPLE SEARCHING FOR ACCOMMODATION

Personalised search results:

Design your search according to your wishes by using many filter and sorting options. Enter your search criteria, save it as a filter and email alert - done. Switch between the offers by swiping. 

Personal profile:

Create your request in the app, send it to landlords and increase your chances already when contacting them.

Messenger:

Communicate quickly and securely with advertisers via our messaging system. Push notifications allow you to respond directly to replies.

Favourites:

Keep track of already contacted and saved offers. So, you never lose sight of your favourite ads. 

FOR ADVERTISERS & LANDLORDS

Easy ad management:

Publish your properties quickly and easily in 3 minutes. Save a draft, check the preview, update, deactivate or delete your offer with one click.

Efficient applicant management:

Organise the contacts in your inbox according to your wishes via individual labels and send as well as receive all important documents. Various email templates facilitate targeted communication.

WE ARE THERE FOR YOU

If you have any questions, requests or suggestions regarding our app, our Customer Care team will be happy to help you at any time at kontakt@wg-gesucht.de. We look forward to hearing from you and wish you every success!

Your WG-Gesucht.de team
